detaileddescription.para: Speed unit conversion: 0.1 km/h to 0.01 km/h scale.

Used in VLK_BF_13_Process function.
values 10u

Function used to check if driver warning (rolling away of the vehicle) if the EPB is not closed is active or not.

Function used to handle the enable of the rollability mode in the production mode to prevent the vehicles from creeping after leaving the vehicle.
Function used to handle p_t_N_entprellt and p_t_entprellung_ersatz_romo timers.

Depending on gear position timers will be run or resetted.
N/A
None
reentrant No context task context thread safe thread safe Yes
void
void Globals
timer_entprellung_ersatz_romo_u16 popupDisabled_b timer_fahrstufe_N_u16 Input->Output-Correlation
timer_entprellung_ersatz_romo_u16 and timer_fahrstufe_N_u16 are run or resetted and popupDisabled_b is set to FALSE if gear is not in position N for p_t_N_entprellt time Activity Diagram of handleTimers Testcase shell be based on the: timer_fahrstufe_N_u16 popupDisabled_b timer_entprellung_ersatz_romo_u16 BF13_VariableBlock_t members possible values. Function used to handle signals for BF 13 processes.

Door is not closed, belt is not fastened and seat not occupied while in position N are checked. Depending on conditions the roll-away ability will be aborted or not.
